title: Giroud leaves LAFC by mutual consent
description: Olivier Giroud has left Los Angeles FC by mutual consent, the club announced on Friday, with the striker expected to sign for Lille. Giroud joined LAFC in July 2024 following his departure from AC Milan, though he has struggled to make an impact in his 12 months at the club. He has scored just five […] The post Giroud leaves LAFC by mutual consent appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Carsley challenges England to create legacy with U21 Euros win
description: Lee Carsley challenged England to create a legacy as they aim to clinch back-to-back European Under-21 Championship titles. The Young Lions, who beat Spain 1-0 to claim the title back in 2023, will come up against Germany in the showpiece on Saturday in Bratislava.
